roleset.name: to soften, quiet

example.name: transitive
example.text: But President Bush is expected [*-1] to veto the congressional legislation and that-2 , along with the easy approval of the Pennsylvania measure , is likely [*-2] to mute the abortion-rights activists ' claims of momentum and underline the challenges faced [*] by this resurgent movement .
example.arg: the abortion-rights activists ' claims of momentum

roleset.note: Frames file for 'mute' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus; adjectival 'muted' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls remedy-45.7

example.name: adjectival rel: muted
example.text: Also ... it 's remarkable how muted the Forum wingnuts are about all this .
